headline: Federal court orders Chemours to stop PFAS discharge from West Virginia facility
summary: The Teflon product manufacturer is disappointed in the court’s ruling and plans to appeal, a company spokesperson said. The company settled another lawsuit related to its Washington Works facility in 2023 for $110 million.
